title: Bitcoin Traders Now Target $70K as Japan Bond Yields Surges to 17-Year Highs
author: Shaurya Malwa
summary: A surge in Japanese bond yields, coupled with geopolitical and economic uncertainties, is fueling concerns among traders that BTC could face a significant correction.
